text: Listen to the Dawn is an album by guitarist Kenny Burrell recorded in late 1980 and released on the Muse label in 1983.Muse LP series discography: 5250 to 5299 accessed April 13, 2017Muse Records discography accessed April 13, 2017Kenny Burrell catalog accessed April 13, 2017 == Reception == The Allmusic review called it a "Sharp trio set" and stated: "The results are uniformly solid, sometimes more emphatic than others. Burrell is still playing in a relaxed, easy groove, but occasionally increases the energy level". == Track listing == All compositions by Kenny Burrell except where noted. # "Yours Is My Heart Alone" (Franz Lehar, Harry B. Smith) – 3:30 # "My One and Only Love" (Guy Wood, Robert Mellin) – 6:14 # "You're My Everything" (Harry Warren, Mort Dixon, Joe Young) – 6:27 # "Listen to the Dawn" – 5:37 # "Isabella" – 5:31 # "It Amazes Me" (Cy Coleman, Carolyn Leigh) – 5:05 # "Never Let Me Go" (Jay Livingston, Ray Evans) – 5:56 # "Papa Joe" – 5:21 == Personnel == *Kenny Burrell – guitar *Rufus Reid – bass *Ben Riley – drums == References == Category:Kenny Burrell albums Category:1983 albums Category:Muse Records albums
title: Listen to the Dawn
